com.ikueb.wallclock

Interface WallClock

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AlarmFixedWallClock, FixedWallClock
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFixedWallClock, FixedAlarmClock, FixedClock, TickingClock

    public interface WallClock
    Specifies a form of clock that provides zoned and non-zoned dates and times.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default java.time.LocalDate date() 
      default java.time.LocalDateTime dateTime() 
      java.time.ZoneId getZone()
      For compatibility with Clock.getZone().
      java.time.Instant instant()
      For compatibility with Clock.instant().
      WallClock offset(java.time.Duration duration)
      Provides an offset WallClock, similar to what Clock.offset(Clock, Duration) does.
      default java.time.LocalTime time() 
      java.time.ZonedDateTime zonedDateTime() 

    • Method Detail

      • zonedDateTime

        java.time.ZonedDateTime zonedDateTime()
        Returns:
        a ZonedDateTime representation of current instant

      • date

        default java.time.LocalDate date()
        Returns:
        a LocalDate representation of current instant

      • time

        default java.time.LocalTime time()
        Returns:
        a LocalTime representation of current instant

      • dateTime

        default java.time.LocalDateTime dateTime()
        Returns:
        a LocalDateTime representation of current time

      • instant

        java.time.Instant instant()
        For compatibility with Clock.instant().
        This is to ensure that even implementations that does not extend from Clock can provide an instant.
        Returns:
        non-null instant from this clock

      • getZone

        java.time.ZoneId getZone()
        For compatibility with Clock.getZone().
        This is to ensure that even implementations that does not extend from Clock can provide a time-zone.
        Returns:
        non-null time-zone used for interpreting instants

      • offset

        WallClock offset(java.time.Duration duration)
        Provides an offset WallClock, similar to what Clock.offset(Clock, Duration) does.
        Parameters:
        duration - the duration to offset by, not null
        Returns:
        a WallClock that returns dates and times based on this WallClock with the duration added
